verses.roman:
nityānanda-līlā-varṇane ha-ila āveśa
caitanyera śeṣa-līlā rahila avaśeṣa

synonyms: nityānanda—Lord Nityānanda; līlā—pastimes; varṇane—in the matter of description; ha-ila—there was; āveśa—ecstasy; caitanyera—of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; śeṣa-līlā—pastimes in the last portion of His life; rahila—remained; avaśeṣa—supplement.
translation: He ecstatically described the pastimes of Lord Nityānanda, but the later pastimes of Caitanya Mahāprabhu remained untold.
